title: 11: I Have Daddy Issues ft. Violet Benson
description:
Sofia is joined by the OG meme queen, Violet Benson aka @DADDYISSUES_! You know the meme you just tagged your BFF in saying “This is SO us”? She basically invented that. In this special episode, the girls talk about quarantine hookups, the Pencil Test, and why you should NOT let your boyfriend cum in you (he doesn’t like you). Sofia also calls Violet out on a potential business move that could’ve altered their friendship forever...

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/
